name: file_share_app
description: Share and Receive Files with other clients with real-time update

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run build
scripts.develop: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix client"
